name: Happy Haunts_Prototype
description:
Hello! Happy Haunts is a "in-progress" game about a Ghost Dog called Happy.

He meets other spooky animals and completes quests for them as he platforms and puzzles his way through levels. His ultimate goal is to track down Sourpuss, the Vampire Cat who unfortunately scared him to death.

This is a very early prototype of the game, and I am focusing on testing out the controls. One version uses the Mouse and Keyboard to control Happy, while the other only uses the Keyboard. It would be great help if after testing the game, you could complete this short 2min survey for me: https://forms.gle/4zfTRcdvU9HmXgMt8

This game is aimed at a younger audience, so if you have any younger siblings or kids who could play-test this as well I would really appreciate it :D

Here's a list of the controls if needed:

___________________________
MOUSE CONTROLS:

Left: A
Right: D
Jump: Spacebar
JumpDown: S

Possess Object: Left Mouse Click (on object)
Unpossess Object: Left Mouse Click (on object)

Scare Crow/Bark: Right Click

___________________________
KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Left: Left Arrow Key
Right: Right Arrow Key
Jump: Up Arrow Key
JumpDown: Down Arrow Key

Possess Object: Z when near object
Unpossess Object: Z

Scare Crow/Bark: X

___________________________
To Exit the Game, Press Alt+F4

Thank you for playing my game and please complete the short survey! :D
